abstract: Sunil Gulati, president of the U.S. Soccer Federation, chatted with reporters before Tuesday night's match between the U.S. and Ecuador.
snippet: Sunil Gulati, president of the U.S. Soccer Federation, chatted with reporters before Tuesday night's match between the U.S. and Ecuador.
lead_paragraph: HARRISON, N.J. -- Sunil Gulati, the president of the United States Soccer Federation, held an impromptu news conference before Tuesday night's international friendly between the U.S. and Ecuador at Red Bull Arena.
